1669530.name: Neon Raiders
1669530.description:
Neon Raiders

From the creators of Mutant Year Zero and Miasma Chronicles comes a turn-based tactical heist game, built from the ground up for co-op.

Think XCOM—but faster, tighter, and fully cooperative.

The year? Who cares. The future? Owned by mega-corps and syndicates who’ll kill you for breathing their air.

Your job? Assemble a crew of Raiders, take the highest-paying contracts you can find, and pull off jobs so insane they’ll be telling stories about them for years to come.

Plan your moves. Execute in perfect sync. Or die trying.

No waiting. No handholding. Just high-stakes, turn-based combat where every decision could make you rich - or leave your crew in body bags.

This is an early demo of what is to come. We’re exploring new ground with Neon Raiders, and we want to see if there’s an appetite for something fresh and different, especially among co-op players craving a new kind of tactical experience.

This demo offers around 20–30 minutes of playtime and focuses on the main gameplay mechanics. You can only select between 4 different character classes. Skills, weapons, and other attributes are not available to select in the demo.

No ship upgrades are available in the demo either.

Come join us on discord to talk with the developers and share tips and feedback!

Tactical Co-op Like You’ve Never Seen It

  • Classic turn-based tactics meet modern pacing: all players plan and act simultaneously. Think fast. Move faster.

  • Solo? You run the whole crew. Co-op? Each Raider’s in your friends’ hands — sink or swim together.

Heists With Teeth

  • Banks. Casinos. Syndicate vaults. Corporate black sites.

  • Grab the prize and run, or push for side objectives to line your pockets. Just don’t forget: if you don’t extract, you lose it all.

Build Your Crew. Upgrade Everything.

  • Brutes with shotguns. Agile sword-cats. Sharpshooters who never miss (unless it's a 99% chance to hit).

  • Outfit them with bleeding-edge gear, weapons, and skills to fit your style, stealthy assassin, loud and proud, or a bit of both.
